description:
Simple, easy-to-use, absolutely free, fast and efficient note taking software.


- Added 6 new emojis: 🔍 📈 💲 ✏️ 🔑 📎️
- Added support for Simplified Chinese (简体中文) using AI translation. Feedback is welcome!
- Fixed an issue where clicking links in notes with a visible scrollbar caused unexpected behavior
- Fixed a bug that prevented tab navigation in the note explorer
- Fixed an issue with the Russian translation
- Fixed issues that caused some UI elements to render incorrectly
- Improved note scrolling for more precise control in scrollable notes
- Improved overall stability and performance
- Updated the SQLite database engine to version 3.50.0
